titleStmt.title: The Anti-weesils, a poem giving an account of some historical and argu-mental passages happening in the Lyon's Court.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Randal Taylor near Stationers-Hall,

notesStmt.note: Answer to "The Weesils", an attack on Dr. Sherlock, ascribed to Thomas Brown. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
